item.title: ‘Hamnet,’ ‘Jay Kelly,’ ‘No Other Choice’ to Screen Texas Premieres at Austin Film Festival – Film News in Brief
item.description: Austin Film Festival has announced the second wave of screenings set to premiere during this year’s festival lineup. The festival will run Oct. 23 to Oct. 30. Newly added Texas premieres will include

item.title: Austin Film Festival to Honor Christopher McQuarrie, With Writers Conference Panels to Include ‘Wicked,’ ‘The Studio’ and More (EXCLUSIVE)
item.description: Austin Film Festival will honor writer, director and producer Christopher McQuarrie with the 2025 Extraordinary Contribution to Filmmaking Award at the Awards Luncheon on Saturday, Oct. 25. Additional
